verses.verse: Then <WG1899> fourteen <WG1180> years <WG2094> after <WG1223> I went up <WG305> <WG5627> again <WG3825> to <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414> with <WG3326> Bar-Nabba <WG921>, and took <WG4838> Titus <WG5103> with me <WG4838> <WG5631> also <WG2532>.

But <WG235> neither <WG3761> Titus <WG5103>, who <WG3588> was with <WG4862> me <WG1698>, being <WG5607> <WG5752> a Greek <WG1672>, was compelled <WG315> <WG5681> to be circumcised <WG4059> <WG5683>:

And <WG1161> that because of <WG1223> false brethren <WG5569> unawares brought in <WG3920>, who <WG3748> came in privily <WG3922> <WG5627> to spy out <WG2684> <WG5658> our <WG2257> liberty <WG1657> which <WG3739> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, that <WG2443> they might bring <WG2615> us <WG2248> into bondage <WG2615> <WG5672>:

To whom <WG3739> we gave place <WG1502> <WG5656> by subjection <WG5292>, no, not <WG3761> for <WG4314> an hour <WG5610>; that <WG2443> the truth <WG225> of the gospel <WG2098> might continue <WG1265> <WG5661> with <WG4314> you <WG5209>.

But <WG1161> of <WG575> these who seemed <WG1380> <WG5723> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> somewhat <WG5100>, (whatsoever <WG3697> <WG4218> they were <WG2258> <WG5713>, it maketh <WG1308> no <WG3762> matter <WG1308> <WG5719> to me <WG3427>: 'Elohim <WG2316> accepteth <WG2983> <WG5719> no <WG3756> man's <WG444> person <WG4383>:) for <WG1063> they who seemed <WG1380> <WG5723> to be somewhat in conference added <WG4323> <WG5639> nothing <WG3762> to me <WG1698>:

But <WG235> contrariwise <WG5121>, when they saw <WG1492> <WG5631> that <WG3754> the gospel <WG2098> of the unb'ritmilah <WG203> was committed unto me <WG4100> <WG5769>, as <WG2531> the gospel of the b'ritmilah <WG4061> was unto Kefa <WG4074>;

(For <WG1063> he that wrought effectually <WG1754> <WG5660> in Kefa <WG4074> to <WG1519> the emissaryship <WG651> of the b'ritmilah <WG4061>, the same <WG2532> was mighty <WG1754> <WG5656> in me <WG1698> toward <WG1519> the goyim <WG1484>:)

And <WG2532> when Ya`akov <WG2385>, <WG2532> Kefa <WG2786>, and <WG2532> Yochanan <WG2491>, who <WG3588> seemed <WG1380> <WG5723> to be <WG1511> <WG5750> pillars <WG4769>, perceived <WG1097> <WG5631> the grace <WG5485> that was given <WG1325> <WG5685> unto me <WG3427>, they gave <WG1325> <WG5656> to me <WG1698> and <WG2532> Bar-Nabba <WG921> the right hands <WG1188> of fellowship <WG2842>; that <WG2443> we <WG2249> should go unto <WG1519> the heathen <WG1484>, and <WG1161> they <WG846> unto <WG1519> the b'ritmilah <WG4061>.

Only <WG3440> they would that <WG2443> we should remember <WG3421> <WG5725> the poor <WG4434>; the same <WG846> <WG5124> which <WG3739> I <WG4704> also <WG2532> was forward <WG4704> <WG5656> to do <WG4160> <WG5658>.

But <WG1161> when <WG3753> Kefa <WG4074> was come <WG2064> <WG5627> to <WG1519> Antioch <WG490>, I withstood <WG436> <WG5627> him <WG846> to <WG2596> the face <WG4383>, because <WG3754> he was <WG2258> <WG5713> to be blamed <WG2607> <WG5772>.

For <WG1063> before <WG4253> that certain <WG5100> came <WG2064> <WG5629> from <WG575> Ya`akov <WG2385>, he did eat <WG4906> <WG5707> with <WG3326> the goyim <WG1484>: but <WG1161> when <WG3753> they were come <WG2064> <WG5627>, he withdrew <WG5288> <WG5707> and <WG2532> separated <WG873> <WG5707> himself <WG1438>, fearing <WG5399> <WG5740> them which were of <WG1537> the b'ritmilah <WG4061>.

And <WG2532> the other <WG3062> Jews <WG2453> dissembled <WG4942> <WG5681> likewise <WG2532> with him <WG846>; insomuch <WG5620> that Bar-Nabba <WG921> also <WG2532> was carried away <WG4879> <WG5681> with their <WG846> dissimulation <WG5272>.

But <WG235> when <WG3753> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> that <WG3754> they walked <WG3716> not <WG3756> uprightly <WG3716> <WG5719> according to <WG4314> the truth <WG225> of the gospel <WG2098>, I said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto Kefa <WG4074> before <WG1715> them all <WG3956>, If <WG1487> thou <WG4771>, being <WG5225> <WG5723> a Jew <WG2453>, livest <WG2198> <WG5719> after the manner of goyim <WG1483>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> as do the Jews <WG2452>, why <WG5101> compellest thou <WG315> <WG5719> the goyim <WG1484> to live as do the Jews <WG2450> <WG5721>?
We <WG2249> who are Jews <WG2453> by nature <WG5449>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> sinners <WG268> of <WG1537> the goyim <WG1484>,

Knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> a man <WG444> is <WG1344> not <WG3756> justified <WG1344> <WG5743> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the Torah <WG3551>, but <WG3362> by <WG1223> the faith <WG4102> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, even <WG2532> we <WG2249> have believed <WG4100> <WG5656> in <WG1519> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, that <WG2443> we might be justified <WG1344> <WG5686> by <WG1537> the faith <WG4102> of Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the Torah <WG3551>: for <WG1360> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the Torah <WG3551> shall <WG1344> no <WG3756> <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> be justified <WG1344> <WG5701>.

But <WG1161> if <WG1487>, while we seek <WG2212> <WG5723> to be justified <WG1344> <WG5683> by <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>, we <WG2147> ourselves <WG846> also <WG2532> are found <WG2147> <WG5681> sinners <WG268>, is therefore <WG687> Moshiach <WG5547> the minister <WG1249> of sin <WG266>? 'Elohim forbid <WG3361> <WG1096> <WG5636>.
For <WG1063> if <WG1487> I build <WG3618> <WG5719> again <WG3825> the things <WG5023> which <WG3739> I destroyed <WG2647> <WG5656>, I make <WG4921> <WG5719> myself <WG1683> a transgressor <WG3848>.
For <WG1063> I <WG1473> through <WG1223> the Torah <WG3551> am dead <WG599> <WG5627> to the Torah <WG3551>, that <WG2443> I might live <WG2198> <WG5661> unto 'Elohim <WG2316>.

I am crucified <WG4957> <WG5769> with Moshiach <WG5547>: nevertheless <WG1161> I live <WG2198> <WG5719>; yet not <WG3765> I <WG1473>, but <WG1161> Moshiach <WG5547> liveth <WG2198> <WG5719> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>: and <WG1161> the life which <WG3739> I <WG2198> now <WG3568> live <WG2198> <WG5719> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> I live <WG2198> <WG5719> by <WG1722> the faith <WG4102> of the Son <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, who <WG3588> loved <WG25> <WG5660> me <WG3165>, and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> <WG5631> himself <WG1438> for <WG5228> me <WG1700>.

I do <WG114> not <WG3756> frustrate <WG114> <WG5719> the grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316>: for <WG1063> if <WG1487> righteousness <WG1343> come by <WG1223> the Torah <WG3551>, then <WG686> Moshiach <WG5547> is dead <WG599> <WG5627> in vain <WG1432>.
